note: Figures for the '1990s' is the average from 1990 (inclusive) to 1999; '2000s' is 2000 to 2009 etc.
title: Decadal average: Global number of large oil spills from tankers
subtitle: Large oil spills are those where more than 700 tonnes is spilt in a single event. Decadal figures are measured as the annual average over the subsequent ten-year period.
